dynamic_position_sizing._risk_comment: Reduced from 1.0% to 0.5% for more conservative trading
dynamic_position_sizing._lot_limits_comment: LIVE: Fixed at 0.01 lot for $200 account safety

_sltp_comment: Wider stops ($200 SL, $300 TP) for volatile BTC market
_comment: Set min_atr to 0 to disable the volatility filter.
_defensive_trading_comment: Defensive trading settings to protect against consecutive losses and bad market conditions
_ema_trend_filter_comment: EMA Trend Filter DISABLED - allowing bidirectional trading (BUY and SELL in any trend)
_ema_explanation: UPTREND = EMA50 > EMA200 (allow BUY). DOWNTREND = EMA50 < EMA200 (block BUY).
_max_spread_comment: Maximum spread as % of price. For BTCUSD at $100k, 0.05% = $50 max spread. Set to 0 to disable.
_max_consecutive_comment: LIVE: Circuit breaker at 5 consecutive losses to protect capital
_session_trading_comment: Session-aware trading: Trade only during optimal market hours

asian._comment: Tokyo session - lower volume, add 5% to confidence threshold

european._comment: London session - high volume, normal trading

american._comment: New York session - high volatility, good for breakouts

_partial_profit_comment: Partial Profit Taking: Close portion of position at 1R, move SL to breakeven

partial_profit_taking._explanation: When price moves 1x your risk (SL distance), close 50% and move SL to entry.

_smart_exit_comment: Smart Exit Logic: Time-based exit and stagnation detection

smart_exit._explanation: Close if held > 2 hours OR price moved < 0.02% from entry after 30 min.
